Deprecated functions

Source: R/deprecated.R
deprecated.Rd

These functions have been deprecated but remain for backwards compatibility.

Usage

bs_theme_new(...)

bs_theme_clear(...)

bs_theme_get(...)

bs_theme_set(...)

bs_theme_base_colors(...)

bs_theme_accent_colors(...)

bs_theme_fonts(...)

bs_theme_add_variables(...)

bs_theme_add(...)

bs_theme_get_variables(...)

bootstrap(theme = bs_theme_get(), ...)

bootstrap_sass(rules = list(), theme = bs_theme_get(), ...)

bs_add_declarations(theme, declarations)

card_body_fill(...)

page_fill(...)

sidebar_toggle(id, open = NULL, session = get_current_session())

nav(...)

nav_content(...)

navs_tab(...)

navs_pill(...)

navs_pill_list(...)

navs_hidden(...)

navs_bar(...)

navs_tab_card(...)

navs_pill_card(...)

Value

a bs_theme() object.

v0.9.1

The function sidebar_toggle() is now deprecated in v0.9.1. Please use toggle_sidebar() instead.

Navigation Containers

Several functions for navigation containers were renamed in version 0.5.0:

  • nav() was renamed nav_panel()

  • nav_content() was renamed nav_panel_hidden()

  • navs_tab() was renamed navset_tab()

  • navs_pill() was renamed navset_pill()

  • navs_pill_list() was renamed navset_pill_list()

  • navs_hidden() was renamed navset_hidden()

  • navs_bar() was renamed navset_bar()

  • navs_tab_card() was renamed navset_card_tab()

  • navs_pill_card() was renamed navset_card_pill()
